zone.line: Mephistopheles
When thou o Lord thyself once again approachest
(is)
And enquirest how all itself with us finds
And thou me often accustomed willingness, knowest
So seest thou me even under the servants
Pardon, I can not high words make
And when one also the entire circle insults
My pathos. thee certain to laugh
not
Hadst thou to thyself the laughter disclaimed
Of the Sun & the World know I not to speak
I see only how thus men to torment
The small God of the world remains continually of equal stamp
And is as wonderful when as at the first day
— A little better would he live
deprived
Hadst thou him not of the splendour of Heavenslight
He calls reason & utility alone
Now bestial when every beast to see
appears
He shines to me with of eternal graces
Like one of the longlegged grasshoppers
Who ever flies, & flitting springs
And equal in the grass his old carol sings
